channel.title: video game retail on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in video game retail on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Grainger Games Logo Grainger Games Limited was a British video game retail chain based in Newcastle upon Tyne, England. Founded by Stephen Bowyer in 1996, it operated shops across Northern England and Scotland. In March 2018, due to financial issues, the company ceased trading and closed all of its 67 shops, leading to the redundancy of 400 employees. Source
You can download theGrainger Gameslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Grainger Games
item.description: Grainger Games Limited was a British video game retail chain based in Newcastle upon Tyne, England. Founded by Stephen Bowyer in 1996, it operated shops across Northern England and Scotland. In March 2018, due to financial issues, the company ceased trading and closed all of its 67 shops, leading to the redundancy of 400 employees. Source
